verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> vai-yak-Hel together מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲדַ֛ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem; to אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, unto them These [are] the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot that [ye] should do אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet Six יָמִים֮ <WH3117> ya-Mim days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> te-'a-Seh be done מְלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> me-la-Chah shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, but on the seventh יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem קֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh there shall be to you an holy day שַׁבַּ֥ת <WH7676> shab-Bat a sabbath שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <WH7677> shab-ba-Ton of rest לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; to the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ha-'o-Seh whosoever doeth ב֛וֹ vo מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> me-la-Chah work יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. therein shall be put to death

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תְבַעֲר֣וּ <WH1197> te-va-'a-Ru Ye shall kindle אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, no fire בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> be-Chol any מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4186> mo-she-vo-tei-Chem; throughout your habitations בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat. upon the sabbath פ Peh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat unto all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> had-da-Var, This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

קְח֨וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu Take מֵֽאִתְּכֶ֤ם <WH853> me-'it-te-Chem תְּרוּמָה֙ <WH8641> te-ru-Mah ye from among you an offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol whosoever נְדִ֣יב <WH5081> ne-Div [is] of a willing לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, heart יְבִיאֶ֕הָ <WH935> ye-vi-'E-ha let him bring אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat it an offering יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> va-Che-sef and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> u-ne-Cho-shet. and brass

וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> u-te-Che-let And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> ve-'iz-Zim. and goats'

וְעֹרֹ֨ת <WH5785> ve-'o-Rot skins אֵילִ֧ם <WH352> 'ei-Lim And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <WH119> me-'ad-da-Mim dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> ve-'o-Rot skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> te-cha-Shim and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> va-'a-Tzei wood שִׂטִּֽים׃ <WH7848> sit-Tim and shittim

וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> ve-She-men And oil לַמָּא֑וֹר <WH3974> lam-ma-'or; for the light וּבְשָׂמִים֙ <WH1314> u-ve-sa-Mim and spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> le-She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> ve-lik-To-ret incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <WH5561> has-sam-Mim. and for the sweet

וְאַ֨בְנֵי־ <WH68> ve-'Av-nei- stones שֹׁ֔הַם <WH7718> Sho-ham, And onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> ve-'av-Nei and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> mil-lu-'Im; to be set לָאֵפ֖וֹד <WH646> la-'e-Fod for the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> ve-la-Cho-shen. and for the breastplate

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol every חֲכַם־ <WH2450> cha-cham- And every wise לֵ֖ב <WH3820> lev hearted בָּכֶ֑ם ba-Chem; יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u among you shall come וְיַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> ve-ya-'a-Su, and make אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. all that the LORD

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֨מִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan, The tabernacle אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אָהֳל֖וֹ <WH168> o-ho-Lo his tent וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִכְסֵ֑הוּ <WH4372> mich-Se-hu; and his covering אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קְרָסָיו֙ <WH7165> ke-ra-Sav his taches וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et קְרָשָׁ֔יו <WH7175> ke-ra-Shav, and his boards אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיחָ֕ו <WH1280> be-ri-Chav his bars אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמֻּדָ֖יו <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dav his pillars וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲדָנָֽיו׃ <WH134> 'a-da-Nav. and his sockets

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָרֹ֥ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron The ark וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> bad-Dav and the staves אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכַּפֹּ֑רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret; thereof [with] the mercy seat וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et פָּרֹ֥כֶת <WH6532> pa-Ro-chet and the vail הַמָּסָֽךְ׃ <WH4539> ham-ma-Sach. of the covering

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מְנֹרַ֧ת <WH4501> me-no-Rat The candlestick הַמָּא֛וֹר <WH3974> ham-ma-'or also for the light וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כֵּלֶ֖יהָ <WH3627> ke-Lei-ha and his furniture וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5216> ne-ro-Tei-ha; and his lamps וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et שֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> She-men with the oil הַמָּאֽוֹר׃ <WH3974> ham-ma-'or. for the light
